name: For foodies and budding chiefs
tagline: A collection of gifts that are perfect for foodies and budding chiefs.

gifts.name: Marcato pasta maker
gifts.description: Help them raise their pasta game with this all time classic. Looks pretty cool on the kitchen island too.

image.alt_text: Image of Marcato pasta maker. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: MEATER meat thermometer
gifts.description: Cook to perfection every time with the best smart thermometer there is

image.alt_text: Image of MEATER meat thermometer. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Halen Mon sea salt in ceramic jar
gifts.description: The salt of choice for chefs around the world. And in a beautiful ceramic jar too. Perfect.

image.alt_text: Image of Halen Mon sea salt in ceramic jar. A great gift to give someone special.
Image of Indigo Drop Ceramic Stand. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Sushi starter kit
gifts.description: Everything someone needs - except the fish - to have fun making sushi

image.alt_text: Image of Sushi starter kit. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Rosewood cook's knife
gifts.description: A top, do it all knife that is perfect for any cook - pro, novice and everything in-between

image.alt_text: Image of Rosewood cook's knife. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Ravioli cutter gift set
gifts.description: Encourage the chief in your life to give ravioli ago... and test it with you.

image.alt_text: Image of Ravioli cutter gift set. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Chocolate mini brownie box
gifts.description: A delicious chocolate-y treat through the post. Yep.

image.alt_text: Image of Chocolate mini brownie box. A great gift to give someone special.
Image of Sous chef gift vouchers. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: The Lionel - Just Cheese
gifts.description: A selection of cheese geeks most popular cheeses. A great starter for anyone new to cheesegeeks.

image.alt_text: Image of The Lionel - Just Cheese. A great gift to give someone special.
Image of Handmade Ceramic Taco Truck. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Ninja CREAMi Ice Cream & Frozen Dessert Maker

image.alt_text: Image of Ninja CREAMi Ice Cream & Frozen Dessert Maker. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Salt, Fat, Acid, Heat
gifts.description: Mastering the 4 essentials of cooking is the magic trick of top chefs. Help the budding chef in your life hit those levels. And feed you?

image.alt_text: Image of Salt, Fat, Acid, Heat. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: HexClad frying pan
gifts.description: The professional grade gear used by the professionals (Andi Oliver). A next level gift.

image.alt_text: Image of HexClad frying pan. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Enamel Roasting Dish
gifts.description: Who said a roasting dish had to be boring? Well KAPKA certainly didn't. Brighten up any kitchen with this gem

image.alt_text: Image of Enamel Roasting Dish. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Wonder oven
gifts.description: A fantastic looking and functioning countertop appliance. Airfry, roast, bake, grill. It does it all.

image.alt_text: Image of Wonder oven. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Jerez garlic crusher
gifts.description: Chopping garlic into tiny pieces can be a real pain. So use this fancy-looking plate to create a paste instead.

image.alt_text: Image of Jerez garlic crusher. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Cookies through the post
gifts.description: Who wouldn't want a delicious treat through the letterbox?!

image.alt_text: Image of Cookies through the post. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Raspberry jelly sweets
gifts.description: These little gems are a recreation of a sweet produced since 1873 - so have that old school, cool retro vibe going on. They are also delicious and big enough to share.

image.alt_text: Image of Raspberry jelly sweets. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Pizza Rocker
gifts.description: Is this a necessity? No. But is it a pretty cool addition to the kitchen? Yes. Well there you go then.

image.alt_text: Image of Pizza Rocker. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Round himalayan salt block
gifts.description: Looks good. Makes things taste good. A great edition to any kitchen.

image.alt_text: Image of Round himalayan salt block. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: The Velvetiser
gifts.description: The must-have gift of 2023 is still a must-have gift of 2024. Go on you know you want to.

image.alt_text: Image of The Velvetiser. A great gift to give someone special.
